name: Python
description: Installs the provided version of Python, as well as PIPX, and other common Python utilities.  JupyterLab is conditionally installed with the python feature. Note: May require source code compilation.

version.description: Select a Python version to install.

additionalVersions.description: Enter additional Python versions, separated by commas. Use 'X.Y' or 'X.Y.Z' for a specific version

installTools.description: Install common Python tools like pylint

optimize.description: Optimize Python for performance when compiled (slow)

installPath.description: The path where python will be installed.

installJupyterlab.description: Install JupyterLab, a web-based interactive development environment for notebooks

configureJupyterlabAllowOrigin.description: Configure JupyterLab to accept HTTP requests from the specified origin

packages.description: Optional comma separated list of Python packages to install with pip

httpProxy.description: Connect to GPG keyservers using a proxy for fetching source code signatures by configuring this option
